about_the_game: The Pharaoh has called upon Asafo, the warrior few match in skill and strength, help save Egypt with the guidance of the Babird Asafo's guiding specter a projection of consciousness, he's especially fond of the deshr'et lands. Seek full awareness of the environment and you will be rewarded.
detailed_description: The Pharaoh has called upon Asafo, the warrior few match in skill and strength, help save Egypt with the guidance of the Babird Asafo's guiding specter a projection of consciousness, he's especially fond of the deshr'et lands. Seek full awareness of the environment and you will be rewarded.
name: The Asafo Journey Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound 5.1 Quality or higher

short_description: Become Asafo in this action adventure platformer. Chaos is corrupting the lands of the Nile valley and it's up to you to restore the balance. Run, jump and fight your way to the hidden enemy.
